title: Training on Utilizing Reading Software Evaluation Frameworks

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Aims to strengthen competencies in developing assessment tools within smartphone-based learning environments.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the three core elements of a research-based assessment framework (interface, pedagogy, content)
Learners can utilize reading software evaluation checklists in smartphone environments with 80% or higher accuracy
Based on assessment results, learners can comparatively analyze three software types tailored to learner characteristics

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
